Yrt wrote:
This isn't coming out for windows cause their making it for the 360, not like C&C where it was just transferred. It should make the controls much easier and more smooth.


I just don't think a game-pad could come anywhere close to as capable as a keyboard and mouse for an RTS game. But then again they could design the game around the game-pad, not just the controls. (Eg. slower gameplay, maybe a real-time pause to make commands ahead of time, etc.)

I never liked game-pads though, I don't understand why the console companies don't produce official keyboard and mice for their consoles, because console gamers would probably buy them instead of the game-pads. Err, at least I know a lot that would buy them instead of game-pads, and console gamers would only benefit.
